title: Cheating, Awkward Situations, Kwanzaa Comedy, Arguing Couples and more.
itunes:title: Cheating, Awkward Situations, Kwanzaa Comedy, Arguing Couples and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Brace yourself for the foolishness that is about to go down. The Chief Love Officer cuts through a situation that has something to do with age. There is one question that is asked when cheating occurs in relationships. Who is to blame? Your favorite play cousin talks about trends and things along with their start date. J. Anthony Brown has suggestions that would get more people to attend your Kwanzaa party. Fool #2 brings us awkward situations that we have all been in. We give you the things that couples can't do without getting into an argument. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog has a message for those who are seeking happiness or success.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
